text:
Empty alt text is better than obscure filename alt text (i.e. `AdobeStock 1234`). Can HubSpot remove the auto filename alt text behavior?

<@U7SL518D6> I know accessibility is near and dear to you. I think a quick win for HubSpot would be to have empty alt text after image field selection. Surely HubSpot could do this in one day, right?
It requires some thought for backward compatibility sake.  So not something that can be crushed immediately but will relay this to the team. Thanks for the feedback I think itâ€™s a good idea.
